title: A possible solution to the mobility problem.
body:
Originally, this thread was going to be about how suppression and stuns were so similar, that why have both, and seeing how stuns are used more, you could just replace all instances of suppression with those of stuns, when I thought to myself, what could we make suppression after this, and what came to mind was something like a slow, but one that would remove the ability to use dashes or blinks.

It would fit the feel of suppression more, if used correctly, because what suppression is isn't necessarily something that forces you to stop, but rather something that makes you move very slowly, and cautiously, and there are a significant amount of champions that don't really have a solid place in the meta, that would really be helped by this change, while also probably helping to lessen the affects of mobility creep without attaching point and click stuns to everything.

A few champions that would need to get changed to facilitate this change would be {{champion:21}} and her e, {{champion:91}}  and his e, {{champion:41}}  and his r, and any other champion that is relatively lackluster with low levels of utility and mobility for their class.

This change would help counter picking against mobility without making things any worse for the Immobile champions, therefore opening up the diversity of the game even further, and facilitating more options during champion select. we might start seeing {{champion:63}} instead of {{champion:7}}, but not every game.

Remember to comment if you have any ideas about this.
